<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/strict.dtd"> <html> <body> <script> function compose() { var eventData = { title: 'ENTER YOUR TITLE', details: 'Objective:

Agenda:

Pre-meeting Homework:
', attendees: [{email: 'stuzo.com_q8hge23s8mdka4nm80jk7fdc08@group.calendar.google.com'}] }; google.calendar.composeEvent(eventData); } </script> <center> <button style="background-color:Crimson;width:300;height:100;font-size:20px;color:white" onclick="compose()">Create a Stuzo Meeting</button> </center> <center> <select id="Months" size=100 autofocus> <option value="January">January</option> <option value="February">February</option> <option value="March">March</option> <option value="April">April</option> <option value="May">May</option> <option value="June">June</option> <option value="July">July</option> <option value="August">August</option> <option value="September">September</option> <option value="October">October</option> <option value="November">November</option> <option value="December">December</option> </select> </center> </body> </html>
